Summary: Second night in a row pointy triangle white center red blue tips not lights plasma like one north west more west one south west more west not moving yet tonight.
divs: Sighting Detailscame home from work looked up with my binoculars at 1118pm I think I had the directions wrong last night. The first one I saw was (is) in the northeast facing east, the brighter (closer one) is in the southeast facing west. They are not moving last night they both moved quite alot from where I saw them originaly. I went to the same place I was when my grandson his girl friend and my son saw them. they are all asleep right now. had no trouble picking them out . they look almost like stars but once I watch them I can see A little difference. when I was on break at workI faced my car where they would be and could see one even though I could see no stars from work. I think the one that was (is) southeast chased something last night. from the flames-plasma whatever it was moving fast now it is just stationary
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gary
There were no other sightings in Gary on or around August 4th 2010
